name: Mayhem on McGuffin Island
description:
Submission for Lowrezjam 2022

Use mouse to move / interact.

Press '?' or '/' to access help window.

Keys 1, 2, 3 act as shortcuts for using inventory items in the top 3 slots.

Speak to the 'Collector' NPC next to you when the game starts to get some backstory. Speak to the other NPCs near the starting area to see what services they offer.

Made with Godot (Game Engine)

Hope you enjoy the game :)
